ORDER BY communityNum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT r.replyNum, r.userCode,m.nickName,r.communityNum, content, r.regDate, NVL(answerCount, 0) answerCount, NVL(likeCount, 0) likeCount, NVL(disLikeCount, 0) disLikeCount FROM reply r JOIN member m ON r.userCode = m.userCode LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT parent, COUNT(*) answerCount FROM reply WHERE parent!=0 GROUP BY parent ) a ON r.replyNum = a.parent LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT replyNum, COUNT(DECODE(replLike, 1, 1)) likeCount, COUNT(DECODE(replLike, 0, 1)) disLikeCount FROM replyLike GROUP BY replyNum ) c ON r.replyNum = c.replyNum WHERE communityNum=#{communityNum} AND r.parent=0 ORDER BY r.replyNum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY
